name: Cubes on Earth
description:
Hello to all courageous gamer and shooters in particular.

This game will test your skills of reactivity and sustainability in a chaotic environment.

The goal is simply to survive until you are able to get rid of all the cubes.

Sounds pretty simple, isn't it?

Keyboard and Mouse Controls!!

Movements.(Forward,Laterals, and backwards) : W,A,S,D.
Jump    :   Space bar
Left Shift:   RUN
Left Mouse Button: SHOOT
Right Mouse Button: Zoom In/ Aim
Pause the Game: P
